offers.agentFriendlyTermsAndConditions: Do you confirm your authorization for ConsumerInfo, Inc., an Experian company, to obtain your credit information, which may include your score and/or report, and to submit your secure order? (CUSTOMER MUST RESPOND IN THE AFFIRMATIVE) When you place your order, you will begin your membership in Experian CreditWorks.  Your credit card will be charged $<%immediate_price%> plus any applicable tax  for each month you continue your membership. If you are not satisfied, you can cancel at any time to discontinue the membership and stop the monthly billing; however, you will not be eligible for a pro-rated refund of your current month's paid membership fee. Do you agree to these terms? "Credit score calculated based on the FICO Score 8 model. Your lender or insurer may use a different FICO Score than FICO Score 8, or another type of credit score altogether. Learn more about the FICO Score 8 model on our website. Also, New York state law restricts the Product Guarantee from being offered to residents of New York." Do you understand these product features? (CUSTOMER MUST RESPOND IN THE AFFIRMATIVE) Your enrollment into the membership is conditional upon your acceptance of our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy when you first log into the website. The Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy are available for your review anytime at www.experian.com/terms and www.experian.com/privacypolicy. Do you agree to these terms? (CUSTOMER MUST RESPOND IN THE AFFIRMATIVE)

benefits.name: Daily Experian Credit Report & FICO<sup>®</sup> Score
benefits.description: Information on your Credit Report can change daily as creditors and lenders report new information about you. You'll get unlimited access to your complete Experian Credit Report and FICO<sup>®</sup> Score with the ability to refresh it once every day.

benefits.name: Experian FICO Score Monitoring
benefits.description: See your Credit Score history on an interactive graph to gain insights into how your Score is changing.

benefits.name: Toll-Free Support Available 7 Days a Week
Experian CreditLock with Attempted Inquiry Alerts
benefits.description: Allows the user to lock/unlock credit checks

placements.description: Compare all 3 FICO<sup>®</sup> Scores and Credit Reports from Experian, TransUnion<sup>®</sup> and Equifax<sup>®</sup>.
placements.headline: Add Your Latest Equifax<sup>®</sup> and TransUnion<sup>®</sup> Credit Reports and FICO<sup>®</sup> Scores
placements.taxFreeTermsAndConditions:
PAYMENT INFORMATION

When you complete your order here, you will begin your membership in Experian CreditWorks℠. Your credit card will be charged $<%month_price%> today and each month that you continue your membership, once you submit your order below. You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time. However, you will not be eligible for a pro-rated refund of your current month's paid membership fee.
placements.termsAndConditions:
PAYMENT INFORMATION

When you complete your order here, you will begin your membership in Experian CreditWorks℠. Your credit card will be charged $<%month_price%>, plus $<%month_tax%> sales tax for a total of $<%month_total%> today and each month that you continue your membership, once you submit your order below. You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time. However, you will not be eligible for a pro-rated refund of your current month's paid membership fee.
placements.promoCodeTaxFreeTermsAndConditions: When you complete your order here, your credit card will be charged today for the first month of your Experian CreditWorks℠ membership. An introductory monthly price of $<%promo_month_price%> will be applied to your membership for <%promo_period%>. After <%promo_period%> of membership, your credit card will be charged $<%month_price%> each month you continue your membership. You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time ; however, you will not be eligible for a pro-rated refund of your current month's paid membership fee.

You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time ; however, you will not be eligible for a pro-rated refund of your current month's paid membership fee.

benefits.name: Daily Experian Credit Report & FICO<sup>®</sup> Score
benefits.description: Information on your Credit Report can change daily as creditors and lenders report new information about you. You'll get unlimited access to your complete Experian Credit Report and FICO<sup>®</sup> Score with the ability to refresh it once every day.

benefits.name: Experian FICO Score Monitoring
benefits.description: See your Credit Score history on an interactive graph to gain insights into how your Score is changing.

benefits.name: Toll-Free Support Available 7 Days a Week
Experian CreditLock with Attempted Inquiry Alerts
benefits.description: Allows the user to lock/unlock credit checks
